name: Minimalist:Pinball
description:
We will be offering you a unique pinball experience with this game, which we specifically developed for smartphones. This addictive game offers unique visuals and mechanics as well as numerous themes.

Its enhanced physics create the feeling of a real-life pinball game.

Game Features:
-Minimalist design.
-Google ranking.
-Google achievements.
-Multi-camera support.
-High graphics performance.
